rules.description: shift + alt + q -> yabai move window to prev space
shift + alt + w -> yabai move window to next space
shift + alt + 1 -> yabai move window to space 1
shift + alt + 2 -> yabai move window to space 2
shift + alt + 3 -> yabai move window to space 3
shift + alt + 4 -> yabai move window to space 4
shift + alt + 5 -> yabai move window to space 5
shift + alt + 6 -> yabai move window to space 6
shift + alt + 7 -> yabai move window to space 7
shift + alt + 8 -> yabai move window to space 8
shift + alt + 9 -> yabai move window to space 9
shift + alt + 0 -> yabai move window to space 10
shift + alt + n -> yabai move window to display 1
shift + alt + m -> yabai move window to display 2
hyper' + q -> yabai focus prev space
hyper' + w -> yabai focus next space
shift + alt + f -> yabai toggle mouse follow

to.shell_command: if [[ $(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m config mouse_follows_focus) == "off" ]]; then /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m config mouse_follows_focus on && osascript -e 'display notification "mouse follows focus: ON" with title "/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai"'; else /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m config mouse_follows_focus off && osascript -e 'display notification "mouse follows focus: OFF" with title "/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai"'; fi

rules.description: hyper' + e -> yabai equalize window sizes
shift + alt + x -> yabai mirror on X-axis
shift + alt + y -> yabai mirror on Y-axis
hyper' + space -> yabai toggle window float

to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --toggle float && osascript -e 'display notification "toggle window float" with title "yabai"'
/opt/homebrew/bin/brew services restart yabai && sudo /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai --load-sa && osascript -e 'display notification "restart yabai" with title "yabai"'
